This short document introduces the dot object and shows how it can be
used to work with commutators.

```{r}
options(warn=0)
`.` <- new("dot")
`.`
```

### Package dataset {-}

Following lines create `dot.rda`, residing in the `data/` directory
of the package.

```{r,label=savethedotobject}
save(`.`,file="dot.rda")
```
